imdb.plot outline: The men and women who streamed into Portland in the 1940s to work in South Portland's shipyards helped win World War II. The Liberty Ships built there became the backbone of troop and equipment transport. These contributions from the homeland, in many cases, were just a valuable as those who fought the battles overseas.
imdb.title: Maine Experience: Liberty Ships
plot: The men and women who streamed into Portland in the 1940s to work in South Portland's shipyards helped win World War II. The Liberty Ships built there became the backbone of troop and equipment transport. These contributions from the homeland, in many cases, were just a valuable as those who fought the battles overseas.::HeidiPerkins
